optionalMoves.description: When operating the transporter under adverse conditions, roll +Duty. On a 10+, choose 2. On a 7-9, choose 1.
holds: The transport is faster than normal.
The transport can cut through interference.

optionalMoves.description: When you Open a Channel, you always Hold at least 1, even on a miss.
When you Perform a Scan, add one extra Hold on a hit.
You may use the Perform a Scan when not in the same system as your target.
You may use moves related to offline systems as if it were not offline with Disadvantage Ongoing. On a miss, the system shuts down permanently until extensive repairs can be made.
You can communicate with any sentient creature, even if the translator systems are offline. If communications are offline, you can still communicate simple concepts through other means.
When you need to warp to another location in a hurry, roll +Duty. On a 10+, choose 2. On a 7-9, choose 1.
holds: The ship doesn’t suffer extra stress from the trip.
The ship arrives in an extra advantageous position.

optionalMoves.description: When you actively pilot a ship into a more advantageous position, roll + Duty. On a 10+, hold 2. On a 7-9, hold 1.
hold: You get into a better position to inflict damage. The next weapons hit inflicts +1 Harm.
You get into a better position to hit vulnerable systems. The next Open Fire is +1 Hold.
You get into a more defensible position. Take +1 Shields against the next hit.
You keep other enemies from reaching you.
You position yourself exactly where you want to in a tight spot.

roleFluff:
The operations officer, also referred to as the ops officer or operations management officer, was a Starfleet position within the operations division which was common in the 24th century. Operations officers manned the ops station on a bridge. (TNG: "Conundrum"; VOY: "Caretaker", "Eye of the Needle")

...As analytical operations relied upon knowledge of science and engineering disciplines, operations officers often performed the additional duties of a science officer, especially when a dedicated science officer was absent. (TNG: "Conundrum"; VOY: "Caretaker", etc.)
